Linear_CD_Model Class Reference

Linear continuous discrete model class of the form dx = AX dt + Bdt + CdW Y_k = HX(t_k) + h + V_k. More...

#include <gaussian_model.h>

Detailed Description

Linear continuous discrete model class of the form dx = AX dt + Bdt + CdW Y_k = HX(t_k) + h + V_k.
